name: Mystical Intrusion
description:
You, the main character of Protagonistville have decided to move into your grandfather's cottage by McLean swamp for some good ol' long-awaited solitude.

Of course, what is a good mysterious cottage without some magical houseguests, taking up all of your living space?

Features:

A depressing unicorn who is on the verge of breaking your couch.

A mermaid nonchalantly hanging out in your bathtub.

A grumpy goblin who's turning your kitchen into a food lab.

Fairies who are determined to make your bedroom their new kingdom.

How will you cope? Will you kick them out? Befriend them?  Or will you break under the rising pressure?

<<>>
